love.quotes: Love is not a problem to be solved but a reality to be experience.
love.author: Anonymous

love.quotes: 'Tis better to have loved and the lost than never to have loved at all.
love.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

love.quotes: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
love.author: Buddha

love.quotes: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.quotes: Where there is love there is life.
love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

love.quotes: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
love.author: Ferdinand Foch

love.quotes: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship we can create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
love.author: Orson Welles

love.quotes: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
love.author: Mother Teresa

love.quotes: True is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
love.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

love.quotes: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
love.author: Pearl Bailey

love.quotes: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
love.author: Lao Tzu

love.quotes: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
love.author: Henry Van Dyke

love.quotes: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
love.author: Victor Hugo

love.quotes: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
love.author: Albert Einstein

love.quotes: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
love.author: Dalai Lama

love.quotes: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
love.author: Torquato Tasso

love.quotes: Love is frienship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving.
love.author: Ann Landers

love.quotes: It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
love.author: Ann Landers

love.quotes: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
love.author: Khalil Gibran

love.quotes: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
love.author: Vincent Van Gogh

love.quotes: The best proof of love is trust.
love.author: Joyce Brothers

love.quotes: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
love.author: Thomas Fuller

love.quotes: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
love.author: Samuel Lover

love.quotes: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
love.author: Oscar Wilde

love.quotes: True love is eternal, inifinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstations.
love.author: Honore de Balzac

love.quotes: When love is not madness, it is not love.
love.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

love.quotes: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue,  a wonderful living side by side can grow.
love.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

love.quotes: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
love.author: Lucille Ball

love.quotes: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.quotes: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
love.author: Blaise Pascal

love.quotes: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
love.author: James Baldwin

love.quotes: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
love.author: John Lennon

love.quotes: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.author: Loretta Young

love.quotes: Faith makes all things possible… love makes all things easy.
love.author: Dwight L. Moody

love.quotes: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
love.author: H.L. Mencken

love.quotes: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
love.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

love.quotes: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
love.author: Carl Sagan

love.quotes: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
love.author: Helen Keller

love.quotes: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
love.author: John Gay

love.quotes: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroided by imagination.
love.author: Voltaire

love.quotes: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
love.author: Erich Fromm

love.quotes: Love doesn’t make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwile.
love.author: Franklin P. Jones

love.quotes: Love is the crowning grace of humanity, the holiest right of the soul, the golden link which binds us to duty and truth.
love.author: Petrarch

love.quotes: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
love.author: Andre Breton

love.quotes: We loved with a love that was more than love.
love.author: Edgar Allan Poe

love.quotes: Love is a frienship set to music.
love.author: Joseph Campbell.

love.quotes: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.quotes: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
love.author: Max Muller

love.quotes: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
love.author: John Galsworthy

love.quotes: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. And I believe that love is stronger than death.
love.author: Robert Fulghum

love.quotes: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
love.author: Rabindranath Tagore

love.quotes: To say 'I love you' one must first be able to say the 'I'
love.author: Ayn Rand

love.quotes: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
love.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

love.quotes: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
love.author: Robert Frost

love.quotes: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
love.author: Theodor W. Adorno

love.quotes: That's what real love amounts to- letting a person be what he really is.
love.author: Jim Morrison

love.quotes: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
love.author: Paulo Coelho

love.quotes: Love cures people- both the ones who give it and the ones who  receive it.
love.author: Karl A. Menninger

love.quotes: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
love.author: Brendan Behan

love.quotes: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
love.author: Ingrid Bergman

love.quotes: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
love.author: Virginia Satir
